### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
    preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    theme VARCHAR(50),
    language VARCHAR(50),
    font_size INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE users SET age = 25 WHERE user_id = 1;

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    preferences JSON
)

    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),

    interaction_data JSON
)

    content_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_title VARCHAR(255),
    content_description TEXT,
    user_id INT,

)

CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  username STRING,
  email STRING,
  age INT,
  preferences JSON
)

  interaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id UUID,
  interaction_type STRING,
  interaction_date TIMESTAMP,
  interaction_details JSON
)

CREATE TABLE user_sessions (
  session_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id UUID,
  start_time TIMESTAMP,
  end_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE personalized_content (
  content_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id UUID,
  content_type STRING,
  content_details JSON,
  view_date TIMESTAMP
)

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    registration_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
    preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    preference_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE user_interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE content (
    content_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(100),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    content_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE personalized_content (
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    content_id INT REFERENCES content(content_id),
    interaction_id INT REFERENCES user_interactions(interaction_id)
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE users SET email='newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id=1;
